title: The disappointing randomness of currency hegemony
summary: We cannot know what the next dominant currency regime will be because all regimes are different

title: India’s Imports of Russian Oil Dropped Sharply in December
summary: Russian oil exports to India fell to less than 25% of the country’s total imports in December, from 34% in November, hitting the lowest in 38 months, The Hindu reported, citing data from the Indian Ministry of Commerce and Industry.
